title: Magnetohydrodynamics (MHD) engineering internship (Princeton Plasma Physics Laboratory)
summary: MHD-focused computational fluid dynamics (CFD) engineering internship at the Princeton Plasma Physics Laboratory in 2021.
demonstrates: Demonstrates knowledge of CFD and MHD principles with OpenFOAM (C++), ability to present technical material in written and oral format, and effective collaboratation in professional environments.

title: Procedural animation software
summary: A partially-complete Python mathematical animation engine conceptually inspired by Grant Sanderson's Manim library.
demonstrates: Demonstrates high-level object oriented programming in Python, graphics and video processing knowledge, and creative application of mathematics to solve complex problems.

title: Motion tracking video analysis
summary: Motion tracking and analysis script written in Python for a lab course at Cal Poly Humboldt.
demonstrates: Demonstrates video processing and data analysis with Python, creative implementation of custom algorithms, and ability to write technical documentation.

title: NHK podcast downloader
summary: Python script to collect and download audio news reports from the NHK's Easy Japanese series.
demonstrates: Demonstrates user-oriented software design, basic web scraping, and the application of programming to real-world problems.

title: 2020 Mathematical Contest in Modeling entry
summary: Data analysis script I contributed to my team's entry in the three-day 2020 COMAP Mathematical Contest in Modeling.
demonstrates: Demonstrates proficiency in data analysis with Python, ability to rapidly prototype solutions, and effective collaboration with peers.
